item.description:
I will be checking out Christina's Fireside Grill in Foxboro, Ma. The lounge has a DJ and dancing starting at 9pm. If you are interested just meet me there.

Christina's Fireside Grille
2 Washington Street, Route 1,
Foxboro, MA 02035
Phone: 508.668.9800
Fax: 508.660.9809


From Boston
Take I-93 South (Route 128N) to I-95 South take exit 9 (Wrentham, Foxboro Rt. 1 South), continue approximately 2 miles on Rt. 1 South, at third light (Papa Gino’s on right, Dunkin Donuts on left) make a u-turn back onto Rte. 1 North, approximately 1/4 mile on right entrance to Christina’s Fireside Grille.

From the South
Take I-95 North to 495 North (Exit 6B), Take Exit 14A, Rte. 1 North. Follow Rte. 1 approximately 5.5 miles. Entrance to Christina's Fireside Grille is on the right. (Approximately one mile North of Gillette Stadium).

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Last minute Dancing
